1.formula:
=html.12x24("

It's like spreadsheets, not much to learn

Easy to share you can publish Vixo spreadsheets as web pages with a single click - safe, secure and uncorruptable.

Easy to collect data you can turn Vixo spreadsheets into forms with a single click - hide all the messy details from your colleagues.

Easy to aggregate Vixo spreadsheets are stored hierarchically - like the spreadsheets on your file system, but you can query and aggregate them - its like being able to say give me all Invoices Bob raised in July that are overdue or add up the manpower requirements for Acme Corporation.

Easy to manage there is only one sign-on for all Vixo spreadsheets and access is managed via groups - just like your other office systems. You can add a person to a group and they get access to everything they need. When they leave you just take them off.

Easy to audit every change is logged - you can find out who changed what and when they did it: for everything - finally spreadsheets you can trust.

Easy to integrate Vixo is proper web. For example, if you need to have a phone call about your data - do it right from within Vixo and keep the recording of the call in the audit log.

Show Me »

Why Use Vixo?

Build systems you need yourself.

Make better decisions because you can share data freely without corruption.

See better and quicker decision-making because you control data input and quality.

Enjoy better business outcomes because you have a single view of data.

Benefit from better co-ordinated business processes in web-based systems.

Get more insight from your data because it is easy to aggregate.

Delegate more effectively because all changes are audited.

See Benefits »

")

Easy to manage there is only one sign-on for all Vixo spreadsheets and access is managed via groups - just like your other office systems. You can add a person to a group and they get access to everything they need. When they leave you just take them off.

Easy to audit every change is logged - you can find out who changed what and when they did it: for everything - finally spreadsheets you can trust.

Easy to integrate Vixo is proper web. For example, if you need to have a phone call about your data - do it right from within Vixo and keep the recording of the call in the audit log.

Show Me »

Why Use Vixo?

Build systems you need yourself.

Make better decisions because you can share data freely without corruption.

See better and quicker decision-making because you control data input and quality.

Enjoy better business outcomes because you have a single view of data.

1.formula:
=html.12x21("

How Do I?

Vixo is just like the spreadsheets you are used to. There are over 100 Excel compatible functions. The formatting is Excel-compatible, it has drag'n'drop, copy'n'paste and lots of other features that you already know

You can do things with Vixo that you just can't do with Excel or Google Docs.

Learn how to make full use of the powerful new features of the Vixo spreadsheet like menus, database queries and using templates.

Explore »

Who By?

Vixo is used by people in lots of different jobs - if you use spreadsheets in your current job you have a use for Vixo.

  • financial controllers
  • energy managers
  • call center supervisors
  • self-employed consultants
  • sales and marketing executives
  • product managers
  • health and safety reps
  • general managers

If you are trapped in manual business processes implemented in spreadsheets, email and shared file systems then Vixo can help you.

What For?

Different people use Vixo for different things, some managers have serveral independant systems built in Vixo.

  • budgets
  • cost center management
  • energy managment
  • call centers
  • contract negotiation
  • expenses
  • asset management
  • configuration management

If you have shared, distributed data that needs to be updated by many people then Vixo is your first choice for building operational systems.

")
1.value:

Vixo is just like the spreadsheets you are used to. There are over 100 Excel compatible functions. The formatting is Excel-compatible, it has drag'n'drop, copy'n'paste and lots of other features that you already know

You can do things with Vixo that you just can't do with Excel or Google Docs.

Learn how to make full use of the powerful new features of the Vixo spreadsheet like menus, database queries and using templates.

Explore »

Who By?

Vixo is used by people in lots of different jobs - if you use spreadsheets in your current job you have a use for Vixo.

  • financial controllers
  • energy managers

  • self-employed consultants
  • sales and marketing executives
  • product managers
  • health and safety reps
  • general managers

If you are trapped in manual business processes implemented in spreadsheets, email and shared file systems then Vixo can help you.

What For?

Different people use Vixo for different things, some managers have serveral independant systems built in Vixo.

  • budgets
  • cost center management
  • energy managment
  • call centers
  • contract negotiation
  • expenses
  • asset management
  • configuration management

If you have shared, distributed data that needs to be updated by many people then Vixo is your first choice for building operational systems.

1.formula:
=html.12x15("

Vixo User Group

Vixo has a special user group with exclusive prices and features.

  • first month free then a special rate for three months - a regular plan for the price of a basic plan - (save £219).
  • one-to-one tuition sessions
  • dedicated support personnel
  • advanced access to new features

In return we need you to participate in our product development community by explaining to us what you are trying to do and helping us shape the product (oh, and by finding bugs for us). We are willing to invest in you, if you are willing to invest in us.

Sign Up »

Enterprise

For enterprise use please get in touch.

Contact Us »

Additional Features

Certain features like integrated telephony and integrated email come with an additional cost.

Contact Us »
")

List of Vixo-specific functions		Full list of functions
Publish spreadsheets as web pagesCan publish read-only spreadsheetsCan publish read-only spreadsheets
Publish spreadsheets as formsHas an appending form mode
Protect spreadsheet cells Protect page, unprotect page, select cells to unprotect, protect page. Nightmare
Spreadsheet Collaboration Not in Excel. Only as part of a check-in/out process with Sharepoint
Selective cell collaboration
Save spreadsheets as reusable templates
Save web/wiki view of spreadsheet pages as templates
Incorporate spreadsheet and form creation from spreadsheets Only by using VBA
Instantiate a chain of spreadsheet pages
Wrap business logic around page creation
Audit history of all cell changes (who, when and from what to what)
Conditional spreadsheet page (workflow) links
Make telephone calls from spreadsheet pages
")

1.formula:
=html.12x14("

When Vixo is the right choice

Spreadsheets are great - we love them at Vixo. Our spreadsheet is designed to make them better. Our focus is on fixing common problems that appear across a wide range of spreadsheet use cases.

Vixo is the right choice if you:

  • regularly cut and paste data into a standard spreadsheet from emails
  • have complex multi-user spreadsheets in a structured file system
  • email out spreadsheet templates and manually collate the responses
  • have shared spreadsheets that regularly suffer from locking problems because many people need to update them
  • have continual accidental data corruption problems from shared spreadsheets

But don't Use Vixo if..

There are times when Vixo is not the right choice for you;

  • if you need live connections to databases
  • if you need pivot tables
Try It Out »
")
1.value:
When Vixo is the right choice

Spreadsheets are great - we love them at Vixo. Our spreadsheet is designed to make them better. Our focus is on fixing common problems that appear across a wide range of spreadsheet use cases.

Vixo is the right choice if you:

  • regularly cut and paste data into a standard spreadsheet from emails
  • have complex multi-user spreadsheets in a structured file system
  • email out spreadsheet templates and manually collate the responses
  • have shared spreadsheets that regularly suffer from locking problems because many people need to update them
  • have continual accidental data corruption problems from shared spreadsheets

But don't Use Vixo if..

There are times when Vixo is not the right choice for you;

  • if you need live connections to databases
  • if you need pivot tables
Try It Out »

=html.12x15("

Premium Plan

  • £499 per month
  • Unlimited Users
  • 2,000,000 cells
  • Daily backup
  • Your own domain name
  • SSL
  • Dedicated support/SLA's
  • Cancel anytime - no lock-in

The premium plan is designed for departmental use in large companies

Regular Plan

  • £99 per month
  • Unlimited Users
  • 85,000 cells
  • Daily backup
  • Your own domain name
  • SSL
  • Shared support
  • Cancel anytime - no lock-in

The regular plan is ideal for most users - it has the right balance of price and features for the normal user.

Basic Plan

  • £39 per month
  • 3 Users
  • 25,000 cells
  • Daily backup
  • Your own domain name
  • Cancel anytime - no lock-in

Free Trial

We offer free trials through the Vixo User Group.

")
